title: Kicked out, try to rejoin, starts a new queue...
body: So basically, I was playing a match in random norms that I had (frustratingly) been losing all match long due to lack of communication on my team, then we finally get our act together, ace the enemy team, and begin our push for the first inhibitor! Then I get Attempting to Reconnect... So I instictively close the client and reopen swiftly (under 10 seconds) only to be put in another queue... I tried searching recenlty played players to ask them if it happened to them as well, but it was blank. And when the queue finally loaded, I got a black screen for champion select. Bug after bug after bug.......... tried again then got the leaverbuster penalty for leaving champion select...

replies.body: I'm not sure which game this was for, but it's possible that someone else may have been afk during the match and prompted a remake while you were offline.  The black screens and connection issues in general sound like network problems reaching the game server.  I recommend going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help get this fixed up and prevent any penalties in the future.  Hope that helps!
